calculator.translation[0].definitions[0]: a small electronic machine that can add, multiply etc
calculator.translation[0].note_box[0].se: The children are taught to use calculators from a young age.
work something out on a calculator
Work it out on a calculator if you can't do it in your head.
add something up on a calculator
I added the cost up on a calculator.
Candidates may use electronic calculators in the exam.
I took out my pocket calculator and added up the figures.
He had a big fancy desk calculator.
The calculations can be done using a hand-held calculator.
